item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 27 Apr 2021
item.description:
1. docs.ocaml.pro : an OCaml Documentation Hub
  2. Decompress 1.4.0
  3. elliptic curves - maintainable and verified (full stack, from primitives to TLS)
  4. First release of Docteur, an opiniated read-only file-system for MirageOS
  5. Ocaml-solidity, a new OCaml library for Solidity
  6. Migrating to floatarray (blog post)
